subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
Having completed my 8 years of office on May 29, 2023 I have handed over your file to the new President of Nigeria Alhaji Bola Ahmed Tinubu (GCFR) and if you want to receive your $35.5 million dollars send an appeal mail to the new President now.
The email account of the new President is    
bolatinubunigpresident@gmail.com
    and he is a courteous and kind person while assuring you that he will not let you down. While sending the appeal mail to the new President do not forget to reconfirm your details to him for verification.
If you fail to comply with this directive, blame yourself if your $35.5 million is revoked and re-assigned to another beneficiary while expecting your urgent response. The ball is on your court and do not allow your $35.5 million suspended indefinitely and good luck ok.
Rtd. Gen. Muhammadu Buhari (GCFR)
Former President, Federal Republic of Nigeria.

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about the change in leadership in Nigeria. I hope Alhaji Bola Ahmed Tinubu GCFR is settling well into his new role as President.

I'm curious, how does this process of transferring funds usually work? And why is it necessary for me to reconfirm my details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Brandon

subject: If you are owed $35.5 million by Nigeria Government send your names, address and phone number to me now so we can start processing the release of the funds to you.
body:
Dear Brandon,

Sorry for my delay due to busy schedules BUT have you at any time been
awarded any contract by Nigerian Government valued at $35.5 million
dollars?  Meanwhile, according to our investigations your name was seen in
our system as being owed such an amount and if so kindly send your complete
names, address and phone number to me so I can start processing the release
of the $35.5 million dollars to you by a working ATM Card.

If you prefer to receive the $35.5 million by wire transfer then send your
names, address, phone number and Bank details to me so the Lawyer I hire to
secure all the genuine government fund release documents to your favor can
start work and all secured documents will be sent to you before the $35.5
million is finally wired to your account ok.

So the process is direct electronic transfer from Central Bank of Nigeria
(CBN) which is the nation's apex Bank to your receiving Bank account and it
will hit your account in 72 hours from the day we secure all legal fund
release documents to your favor ok. So I am expecting your details so we
can move ahead and if I do not hear from you tomorrow then it is assumed
you are not ready and we can re-assign the $35.5 million to another
beneficiary.

Alhaji Bola Ahmed Tinubu (GCFR)
New President & Commander in Chief, Federal Republic of Nigeria.

subject: Re: If you are owed $35.5 million by Nigeria Government send your names, address and phone number to me now so we can start processing the release of the funds to you.
body:
Hello Alhaji Bola Ahmed Tinubu GCFR,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite intriguing! I don't recall being awarded any contract by the Nigerian Government, but it's possible that I might have forgotten due to my busy schedule.

Could you please provide more details about this contract? When was it awarded and what was it for? Also, how did my name appear in your system?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Brandon

subject: Having explained how the contract emanated send your details so we can move ahead or do we re-assign the $35.5 million to another beneficiary?
body:
Dear Brandon,

If you have forgotten that you had some years ago awarded contract with
Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) the record is there ok. Even
if you do not know about this claim I can shield you while you give me my
reward at the end of the day.

This contract emanated from NNPC where you laid pipelines and supplied
circuit breakers and other crude oil exploration materials valued at $35.5
million dollars and documents will show all that you did ok.

Lastly, the contract was awarded many years ago as it will be specified
when we secure all legal contract / fund release documents to your favor.
Your name appeared in our system as the main contract of which I cannot
tell because I was not the President of Nigeria then. So I am expecting
your details and note that this transaction is 100% risk free ok.

Alhaji Bola Ahmed Tinubu (GCFR)
New President & Commander in Chief, Federal Republic of Nigeria.

subject: Re: Having explained how the contract emanated send your details so we can move ahead or do we re-assign the $35.5 million to another beneficiary?
body:
Hello Alhaji Bola Ahmed Tinubu GCFR,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must admit, your message has left me a bit puzzled. I don't recall being involved in any contract with the Nigerian National Petroleum NNPC. However, it's possible that I might have forgotten about it.

Could you please provide more details about this contract? When exactly was it awarded and what was my role in it? Also, could you explain how my name appeared in your system as the main contractor?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Brandon
